dc:title: From The Mailbag
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Highlights from letters from those connected to the Catholic Worker community. She extols their hard work and struggles.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 677 1954-11-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
